metadata.description: Advanced DSA Interview Problems Database - Patterns 12-22 (25-40 problems per pattern)
metadata.note: Advanced patterns covering Trees, BST, Graphs, Trie, DP, Heaps, Intervals, Bit Manipulation, Math, DC, System Design

trees.description: Tree traversal (DFS: preorder/inorder/postorder, BFS level-order), height, diameter, LCA, path sum variants

problems.title: Binary Tree Level Order Traversal
problems.pattern_reason: BFS level-order traversal with queue - FAANG classic

problems.title: Binary Tree Zigzag Level Order Traversal
problems.pattern_reason: Zigzag BFS with alternating direction levels

problems.title: Binary Tree Level Order Traversal II
Diameter of Binary Tree
problems.pattern_reason: Diameter = longest path between two nodes

problems.title: Lowest Common Ancestor of Binary Tree
problems.pattern_reason: LCA via DFS post-order traversal - FAANG favorite

problems.title: Path Sum II
problems.pattern_reason: Find all root-to-leaf paths with target sum

problems.title: Sum Root to Leaf Numbers
problems.pattern_reason: Sum all numbers formed by root-to-leaf paths

problems.title: Same Tree
problems.pattern_reason: Tree structure & value comparison via DFS

problems.title: Symmetric Tree
problems.pattern_reason: Mirror symmetry check via recursive DFS

problems.title: Minimum Depth of Binary Tree
problems.pattern_reason: Find shortest path to leaf node

problems.title: Populating Next Right Pointers in Each Node

problems.pattern_reason: Level linking for non-perfect binary tree

problems.title: Flatten Binary Tree to Linked List
problems.pattern_reason: Convert to linked list via preorder + pointers

problems.title: Binary Tree Maximum Path Sum
problems.pattern_reason: Path sum without restriction via DFS post-order

problems.title: Construct Binary Tree from Preorder and Inorder

problems.pattern_reason: Full tree serialization via preorder traversal

problems.title: Count Good Nodes in Binary Tree
problems.pattern_reason: Track max on path via DFS

problems.title: Maximum Sum BST in Binary Tree

problems.pattern_reason: Level-order traversal finding max per level

problems.title: Insufficient Nodes in Root to Leaf Paths
problems.pattern_reason: Path sum filtering with tree pruning

problems.title: Longest Univalue Path
problems.pattern_reason: Path with same values via DFS

problems.title: Deepest Leaves Sum
problems.pattern_reason: BFS finding and summing deepest level

problems.pattern_reason: Count unique BST structures via DP

problems.pattern_reason: Inorder iteration with O(1) space amortized

problems.pattern_reason: K closest values via inorder + deque
